title: riot plz fix this tired of losing lp cause of it
body: ok so last couple days i gone into a rank match and the screen is just pitch black i can hear sounds of people banning but always end up with me dodging cause i can't see anything or do anything this is on the new client.

replies.body:
This is an issue we've been investigating for a bit, and found that collapsing your friend's list group has been able to serve as a current work around.

https://imgur.com/wMLOFya

Let me know if that does the trick for you!
thanks i'll try it out see if the problem ever happens again
